entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
